    • Method Detail

      • setAllActions

        public void setAllActions(java.util.ArrayList<BattleAction> actions)
        Description copied from interface: UnitController
        Sets all possible actions available to this unit. This list ignores constraints from the context of the battle/combat. Calls to this method should result in any filters previously placed on this unit's actions to be removed.
        Specified by:
        setAllActions in interface UnitController

      • getAllActions

        public java.util.ArrayList<BattleAction> getAllActions()
        Description copied from interface: UnitController
        Gets all the possible actions available to this unit. The returned list will ignore all constraints from the context of the battle.
        Specified by:
        getAllActions in interface UnitController
        Returns:

      • filterAllActions

      • filterAvailableActions

        public void filterAvailableActions(java.util.function.Predicate<BattleAction> filter)
        Description copied from interface: UnitController
        Filters the actions available to this unit based on a given predicate. Implementations of this function should result in the same return value for UnitController.getAllActions() but a filtered return value for UnitController.getAvailableActions().
        Specified by:
        filterAvailableActions in interface UnitController

      • getAvailableActions

        public java.util.ArrayList<BattleAction> getAvailableActions()
        Description copied from interface: UnitController
        Gets all currently available actions for this unit. This list will not include those that have been filtered out.
        Specified by:
        getAvailableActions in interface UnitController
        Returns:

      • refresh

        public void refresh()
        Description copied from interface: UnitController
        This method will be called on a battle controller whenever a new set of actions is available and the controller needs to select a new action. It should result in isActionSelected() being equal to false, until the controller has selected a new action.
        Specified by:
        refresh in interface UnitController
